text: North Carolina's 2nd congressional district is a congressional district in central North Carolina. Its current representative is Democrat Deborah Ross. == Election results == === 2002 === === 2004 === === 2006 === === 2008 === === 2010 === === 2012 === === 2014 === === 2016 === === 2018 === === 2020 === == List of representatives == Member Party Years Cong ress Electoral history District location Hugh Williamson Anti-Administration March 19, 1790 – March 3, 1791 Elected in 1790.
